name: Hunguest Hotel Sóstó
description: Hunguest Hotel Sóstó features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Nyíregyháza. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The wellness area includes an indoor pool, fitness centre and sauna, while an outdoor swimming pool is also available. At the hotel each room has air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. An American, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Hunguest Hotel Sóstó offers a hot spring bath. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Nyíregyháza, like hiking and cycling. The nearest airport is Debrecen International Airport, 60 km from Hunguest Hotel Sóstó.
